Header.comment: This is an automatically generated file. Do not edit.

experiment_simplified.1pctCO2: CO2 prescribed to increase at 1% per year
experiment_simplified.1pctCO2-bgc: biogeochemically-coupled version of 1 percent per year increasing CO2 experiment
experiment_simplified.1pctCO2-rad: radiatively-coupled version of 1 percent per year increasing CO2 experiment
experiment_simplified.abrupt-127k: abrupt imposure of the orbit and greenhouse gases of 127 ka before present
experiment_simplified.abrupt-4xCO2-1950: Idealised experiments for CMIP-comparable metrics - abrupt 4xCO2 starting form the end of spinup-1950
experiment_simplified.amip-m4K: AMIP experiment with uniform 4K SST decrease
experiment_simplified.amip-p4K: AMIP experiment with uniform 4K SST increase
experiment_simplified.amip-p4K-SST-rad: AMIP experiment with uniform 4K increase in the SST input to radiation
experiment_simplified.amip-p4K-SST-turb: AMIP experiment with uniform 4K increase in the SST input to surface turbulent fluxes
experiment_simplified.dcppB-forecast-cmip6: forecast initialized from observations with forcing from ssp245
experiment_simplified.esm-flat10-cdr: 10 PgC/yr constant CO2 removal / negative emissions experiment
experiment_simplified.esm-hist: Simulation of the recent past (emissions driven)
experiment_simplified.esm-scen7-h-AQ: Future scenario esm-scen7-h with high aerosol and tropospheric non-methane ozone precursor emissions
experiment_simplified.esm-scen7-h-Aer: Future scenario esm-scen7-h with high aerosol emissions
experiment_simplified.esm-scen7-vlho-AQ: Future scenario esm-scen7-vlho with high aerosol and tropospheric non-methane ozone precursor emissions
experiment_simplified.esm-scen7-vlho-Aer: Future scenario esm-scen7-vlho  with high aerosol emissions
experiment_simplified.esm-up2p0: Ramp up with constant CO2 emissions leading to 2 degree C/century warming
experiment_simplified.esm-up2p0-gwl2p0: Zero-emission run starting at 2 degree C GWL
experiment_simplified.hist-GHG: Historical simulation with time evolving greenhouse gas forcing only and all other forcings at pre-industrial levels.
experiment_simplified.hist-irr: Historical simulations with irrigation switched on
experiment_simplified.hist-nat: Natural-only historical simulations (solar irradiance, stratospheric aerosol)
experiment_simplified.hist-noirr: Historical simulations with irrigation switched off
experiment_simplified.hist-piAQ: Historical simulation with pre-industrial aerosol and tropospheric non-methane ozone precursors
experiment_simplified.historical: Simulation of the recent past (concentration driven)
experiment_simplified.piClim-2xBVOC: Pre-industrial climatology with doubled biogenic volatile organic carbon emissions
experiment_simplified.piClim-2xDMSpPMOA: Pre-industrial climatology with doubled emissions of primary marine organic compounds and dimethyl sulphide
experiment_simplified.piClim-2xWet: Pre-industrial climatology with doubled wetland emissions of methane
experiment_simplified.piClim-2xdust: Pre-industrial climatology with doubled mineral dust emissions
experiment_simplified.piClim-2xfire: Pre-industrial climatology with doubled emissions of all fire-derived gases and aerosols
experiment_simplified.piClim-2xss: Pre-industrial climatology with doubled sea-salt emissions
experiment_simplified.piClim-4xCO2: As piClim-control except CO2 concentrations set to 4 times preindustrial
experiment_simplified.piClim-AQ: Pre-industrial climatology with present-day aerosol and ozone precursors
experiment_simplified.piClim-BC: Pre-industrial climatology with present-day emissions of black carbon
experiment_simplified.piClim-N2O: Pre-industrial climatology with present-day nitrous oxide
experiment_simplified.piClim-NH3: Pre-industrial climatology with present-day ammonia emissions
experiment_simplified.piClim-NOx: Pre-industrial climatology with present-day nitrogen oxides (NOx)
experiment_simplified.piClim-O3: Pre-industrial climatology with present-day tropospheric ozone precursors
experiment_simplified.piClim-OC: Pre-industrial climatology with present-day organic carbon emissions
experiment_simplified.piClim-ODS: Pre-industrial climatology with present-day ozone depleting substances
experiment_simplified.piClim-SO2: Pre-industrial climatology with present-day sulphur dioxide
experiment_simplified.piClim-aer: Effective radiative forcing by present-day aerosols
experiment_simplified.piClim-anthro: As piClim-control except present-day anthropogenic forcing
experiment_simplified.piClim-control: Pre-industrial conditions, with sea surface temperature (SST/tos) and sea ice concentration (SIC/siconc) prescribed using an annually-repeating climatology from a 30-year or greater period from the piControl simulation of the host model
experiment_simplified.piClim-histaer: historical and future transient effective radiative forcing from aerosols
experiment_simplified.piClim-histall: historical and future transient effective radiative forcing from all forcers
experiment_simplified.piClim-p4K: Pre-industrial climatology plus uniform 4k sea surface temperature
experiment_simplified.piControl: Coupled atmosphere-ocea preindustrial control run (concentration driven)
experiment_simplified.scen7-hc-AQ: Future scenario scen7-hc with high aerosol and tropospheric non-methane ozone precursor emissions
experiment_simplified.scen7-hc-Aer: Future scenario scen7-hc with high aerosol emissions
experiment_simplified.scen7-vlhoc-AQ: Future scenario scen7-vlho with high aerosol and tropospheric non-methane ozone precursor emissions
experiment_simplified.scen7-vlhoc-Aer: Future scenario scen7-vlhoc with high aerosol emissions
